ad_text: Pediatric Home Service Careers- Kansas Sponsored We have a kiddo in Wichita that is needing part time hours covered: Wednesday 3:30p-11:30p, Sunday 8a-5p. Below is a little information to get to know Ryan! "He is a very sweet, loving little boy, and is full of smiles. He is a joy to care for, and loves to talk and snuggle. Ryan needs help getting ready for the day, g-tube feeding, taking medicine, nap time, playtime, and helping him get ready for bed at the end of the day, etc. The addition to this is that Ryan has cochlear implants to help him access sound and learn to speak. He also has others tools that he uses to help him learn to stand, walk, etc. that should be utilized throughout the day. My husband and I, as well as our physical therapist, can help the nurse become accustomed with these tools and when/how they should be used." If you are an RN or LPN in the Wichita area looking to pick up a few more hours during the week, check out our careers page! https://www.pediatrichomeservice.com/careers/
